dmca.title: Your illegal copyright infringement at travelguides4u.net and f1-daily.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

The URLs in question are currently not accessible as of 2:41:23 p.m.
(GMT-6) on April 12, 2007.

 

Legal Response Team

 

________________________________

From: World Travel Guide [mailto:derek@worldtravelguide.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 11, 2007 9:10 PM
To: domainsmanager2000@yahoo.com
Cc: Copyright; Legal
Subject: Your illegal copyright infringement at travelguides4u.net and
f1-daily.com
Importance: High

 

Re: Digital Millennium Copyright Act Infringement

 

WITHOUT PREJUDICE

 

TO:       Tom Lee (domainsmanager2000@yahoo.com) 

            207 Wayland St. 

            Sanfransisco, CA 94134 

            US 

            Tel: 415-452-6440 

 

Dear Mr. Tom Lee at domainsmanager2000@yahoo.com

 

Re: your sites travelguides4u.net and f1-daily.com

 

Consider this legal notice that we have become aware that you are in  

copyright infringement of our copyright contents by copying and using 

without permission our copyrighted text, and images from our copyright 

protected Web site at http://www.worldtravelguide.com
<http://www.worldtravelguide.com/>  

 

I am referring to your web sites at the following two domain registered
to you:

http://www.travelguides4u.net and http://www.f1-daily.com hosted by The
Planet.

 

Your two sites are identical clones of our original content,
copyright-protected 

site at http://www.worldtravelguide.com
<http://www.worldtravelguide.com/>  

 

At travelguides4u.net, the only things altered on your stolen site is a
slight 

modification to our logo to rename it Travel Guides4U,  the copyright
notice has 

been changed from World Travel Guide to TravelGuides4U.net. Your other
site at 

f1-daily.com is an identical clone of our site.

 

Your theft and illegal use of our copyright protected can be clearly
demonstrated by 

use of the Internet archive of the site at WayBack Machine at:

http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://www.travelguides4u.net
<http://web.archive.org/web/*/http:/www.travelguides4u.net>  

which shows other different site versions at the domain in 2004, 2005,
and 2006,  so 

I can only assume the theft of our entire copyright-protected site has
occurred since 

April 28, 2006.

 

Whereas Wayback Machine at
http://web.archive.org/web/*/http://www.worldtravelguide.com
<http://web.archive.org/web/*/http:/www.worldtravelguide.com>   

demonstrates that the design and content of worldtravelguide.com has
been consistent

since August 5, 2004.

 

You are stealing content from a copyright protected website. World
Travel Guide owns 

all of the rights to worldtravelguide.com and all articles, graphics,
images and content

on the site. These rights are protected by the Digital Millennium
Copyright Act (the text 

of which can be found at the U.S. Copyright Office Web Site
www.copyright.gov/legislation/dmca.pdf  )

 

Your site is in violation of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act 

(Herein referred to as "DMCA"). We have downloaded the digital html 

files and also printed the html files as legal evidence.

 

You will face legal action if our stolen site is not entirely removed
from any and 

all domains you own, including travelguides4u.net and f1-daily.com
within 3 days.

 

In addition, if all content owned by World Travel Guide is not 

removed within 3 days,  your hosting provider, The Planet, Google, and
Yahoo will 

be sent DMCA infringement notifications. In accordance with the DMCA 

act your ISP must expeditiously suspend all hosting services. Your ISP 

will not be required to provide you notification until after the site 

has been removed. In addition, both Yahoo and Google comply with the 

DMCA act and will delist and permanently ban your websites from their
respective 

 

directories.

 

Based upon the foregoing, we hereby demand that you confirm to us in 

writing within three (3) days of receipt of this email that: (i) you 

have removed all infringing materials from your site, and (ii) you will 

refrain from posting any similar infringing material owned by World
Travel Guide on 

the Internet or any other on-line service in the future.

 

The foregoing is without waiver of any and all rights of World Travel
Guide, all of 

which are expressly reserved herein.

 

 

Derek McKnight

VP Legal and Compliance

derek@worldtravelguide.com

World Travel Guide

 

 

 

--------------------------------------------------

mod_bwlimited/1.4 FrontPage/5.0.2.2635.SR1.2 mod_ssl/2.8.28
OpenSSL/0.9.7a 

PHP-CGI/0.1b

(Spry.com also uses Apache)  

IP Address: 69.93.99.66

Response Code: 206
